DOC.brief_summary: This protocol describe first administration GSK2018682 human . The study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics single ascend dos GSK2018682 . The study also provide preliminary evidence potential therapeutic dose-range measure inhibitory effect GSK2018682 total lymphocyte count .
DOC.detailed_description: This protocol describe first administration GSK2018682 human . The study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics single ascend dos GSK2018682 . The study also provide preliminary evidence potential therapeutic dose-range measure inhibitory effect GSK2018682 total lymphocyte count .
DOC.criteria: Healthy determine responsible experienced physician , base medical evaluation include medical history , physical examination , laboratory test cardiac monitoring . A subject clinical abnormality laboratory parameter significantly outside reference range population study may include Investigator GSK Medical Monitor agree find unlikely introduce additional risk factor interfere study procedure . Subjects lymphocyte count outside normal range always exclude enrollment BMI within range 19 28 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) . A positive prestudy Hepatitis B surface antigen positive Hepatitis C antibody result within 3 month screen Current chronic history liver disease , know hepatic biliary abnormality ( exception Gilbert 's syndrome asymptomatic gallstone ) . A positive prestudy drug/alcohol screen . A positive test HIV antibody . History regular alcohol consumption Subjects history , examination suspicious , skin cancer ( ) include melanoma , basal cell squamous cell carcinoma . Systolic blood pressure le 95 mmHg great 140 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure less equal 50 mmHg great equal 95 mmHg . Symptomatic reduction blood pressure orthostatic challenge . Subjects rest heart rate le 45 beat per minute great 90 beat per minute Other criterion may apply defined clinical protocol .
